channel.title: [FIXED] Infinite spawn loop
channel.description:
[tt]map : bm_c1a1e at: -3846 x, -8361 y, -3681 z[/tt]
At this point in the map there is a platforming challenge where you have to jump on some boxes hanging from a rail. If you fall down from the box at the specified position, (-3846 x, -8361 y, -3681 z) you will respawn inside the box, causing it to push you out of it, so that you fall down and respawn again. Rinse, repeat.

item.title: [FIXED] Infinite spawn loop
item.dc:creator: Zageron
item.description:
Posted a duplicate issue, found this afterwards.
Auto-Save error

Read full topic
